questions.explanation:
Lilith's.

	Frasier said he was meeting her and Lilith at the bar. He said she was very demanding.

Betty.

	Betty was played by Marilyn Cooper. Marilyn Cooper was born in 1934. She died at age 74 on April 22, 2009 after a long illness.

Atlantic City.

	A woman named Debbie won a free trip for two, to Atlantic City. Sam pretended he won the same thing and convinced her to go with him with her tickets, thereby using only one set of tickets.

questions.text: Who was going to renew their wedding vows?
questions.explanation:
Frasier and Lilith.

	Lilith's mother never got over missing the Cranes' wedding, so at her request they were renewing their vows. Lilith let her mother control her.

questions.text: Who had trouble insulting this mother?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla told her she couldn't come in and insult people and order them around, because that was Carla's job. Betty said, "I would have thought your job would be to live under a bridge." Carla replied, "Yeah, well unless you want some bridge work done, you'd better shut up." She told the guys that Betty rattled her.

questions.text: How much did Norm win on Black-17?
questions.explanation:
He never said.

	Sam told him he hit the first time, but got distracted and let it ride. He told Norm it hit again and showed Norm the amount. Norm showed everyone else and said, 'I'm rich. I'm rich," but he never said the amount.

questions.text: What did Lilith keep telling Woody?
questions.correct: Thank you very much Woody, I appreciate that.
options: Thank you Woody, I don't know what I'd do without you.
questions.explanation:
Thank you very much Woody, I appreciate that.

	Woody kept talking not getting the hint. Lilith explained that in certain situations what she said meant, "I don't thank you. I don't appreciate it, and I want you to shut your mouth." Woody replied, "Thank you very much Dr. Sternin-Crane I appreciate that."

questions.text: What did Norm do with the money he won?
options: He bought season tickets to the Celtics.
He payed off his bar tab.
questions.explanation:
He bought Sam a boat.

	He didn't tell Sam it was for him at first, so Sam blew up on him. He told him he hoped Norm's boat sank. Then when he found out it was for him he said, "I mean thank you."

questions.text: Why did Lilith say she was renewing her vows?
questions.correct: Her mother was emotionally blackmailing her.
options: Her mother was dying and this was her last wish.
questions.explanation:
Her mother was emotionally blackmailing her.

	Frasier told her she was beautiful and that made her angry, so she told him off. Then she told her mother off as well. Betty said, "It's so beautiful. I said the same thing to my mother on my wedding day."

questions.text: Did Frasier and Lilith renew their wedding vows?
questions.explanation:
No.

	They were going out in the front room to do so until Frasier kissed Lilith. After that Frasier locked the bathroom door and said, "Oh to hell with the damn I dos."
